website_summaries.verdict: An affordable set that features 24 dent-pulling tabs of different sizes and shapes.
pros: Can remove dents of different shapes and sizes
Works great for door dings and hail damage

customer_reviews.title: No Paint Dent Removal
customer_reviews.text: Just got my PDR Gliston Paintless Dent Repair Kit today. Years ago my 1983 Trans Am was parked under an acorn tree and as you can imagine, my car was hit in many places on the hood leaving lots of unsightly dings.I used this tool to remove those dings with ease and to my amazement they were all removed with no painting necessary. I love this tool and the ease of it's use, if I went to a bodyshop my wallet would have a huge hole in it, this saved me lots of money. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: A. Kingsbury

customer_reviews.title: Will try to work them out better here when I'm not so busy
customer_reviews.text: For as cheesey as it looks, it really does work. I had several DEEP hail dents. Took a couple of tries to figure it out but it pulled out 90% of the dent on 4 spots. I know where they are and have to look a little harder to find them now. Will try to work them out better here when I'm not so busy.
customer_reviews.author: DennisDillon

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I would have liked improvement with is the directions
customer_reviews.text: After receiving the product I am very impressed with what came in the box especially for the price. The quality of the remover was most impressive. It is very heavy duty and well put together. There are many fittings for all sorts of dent sizes and shapes. The only thing I would have liked improvement with is the directions. They could be written better and more detailed. One example is to mention what the different colored glue sticks are for? I dd some research and have read people mentioning different outdoor temperatures. Overall...It's a very good product that has helped me to nearly eliminate a couple pesky dents after little practice.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool! we used this tool to pull out ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool! we used this tool to pull out a dent above our rear tire. Compared to other kits we have used, this was amazing, the actual puller tool is built solid, reusable and very simple. It has pads which prevents the tool from damaging the car. Comparing this tool to higher cost shop tools, it is amazing that you can save so much money. This tool really has saved us a lot of money by letting us simply pull out dents from our own garage, I would definitely recommend this tool to anyone looking for to fix dents easily on their own.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wynne

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!  Glue is not strong enough!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit to remove a couple small dents on my brand new Dodge Ram. I tried using both the regular glue sticks and the black glue sticks. I cleaned the area with the cleaner recommended and then applied the glue from the gun to the “puller” piece. Every time is go to pop the dent out, the glue would come off easily and after 8 or 9 attempts, I finally gave up. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars, I would. I followed the directions to a T and had no results whatsoever. It seemed like the glue was not sticking properly as the “buttons” would release with almost no pressure. After reading the instructions twice and watching a couple different YouTube videos, I gave up and put it up on my shelf. It will likely end up in the Tracy, but will hold on to it in case there’s another need around the house with something other than vehicle sheet metal.
customer_reviews.author: Kent McIntire

customer_reviews.title: No grip, does not work Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Granted it was only 30 dollars so my expectations were low. Go get a couple beers at a local bar and save yourself the aggravation. First the glue stick does not stick at all to the pucks. but the puck pulls right off the glue and once you peel the glue off the car it sticks to the paint and leaves a mess. I have three cars with tiny to a mid sized dent in them. Not one dent pull had ANY resistance at all using either type of glue stick. all three pulled the puck right off with NO resistance at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dyna Dave

customer_reviews.title: The tabs are weak crap. Wasted hours of time getting stuck tabs off ...
customer_reviews.text: The tabs are weak crap. Wasted hours of time getting stuck tabs off my new car with goo gone. Almost every tab I tried stretched or broke. Save your $
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I had mixed success using this dent remover. A big help was going on YouTube and watching some of the tutorials. Some of the dents I used this tool on were relatively easy to remove. Others took a little more work but the bottom line is that even the more difficult dents looked better after using the Fliston Dent Repair tool. Even though they were not completely gone they were much less visable and that was a win for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Olson

customer_reviews.title: Work good ,worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I order it to repair some door dings (hail damage) Here is my experience 1.clean dent surface 2.put the glue to gun and heat(also it need about 5-10min ) 3.pull the trigger and apply the drawing gasket with extruded glue (The 4 holes of gasket should be applied with hot melt glue) 4.immediately place pad in the center of the dent and hold until sticks 5.place stem of pad throungh hole pulling bridge and screw knob 6.tighten knob until pad pops off 7.clean the surface However i repeat it for several times(because dent is large) In short this kit is work good for dent ,i recomment it .
customer_reviews.author: Sincere Buyer

customer_reviews.title: This little tool works pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: This little tool works pretty darn good. I used it to take out a couple of door dings and had an easy time with it. The only thing I recommend to people buying this, is to get the glue gun that you need to use with this item. The glue gun does not come in the package and you need it to use this item. I recommend buying the set with the glue gun already in it. The glue gun is $9.99 on its own. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: jsiloran

customer_reviews.title: Looks, feels and operates nice!  UPDATED: Well maybe not!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this, its appears very sturdy and high quality for the price. I would maybe recommend. UPDATE: changed my rating, see picture. As others have said, the pulls break way too easy. Now to research better pulls. UPDATE Nov 2, 2017- Lowered rating again for the device itself. First the tabs break easily, now the pull itself has fallen apart. I tried using some medium base locktite to keep it screwed together, did not work. The few times I used, it worked well, so I guess the moral is, "you get what you pay for!" If you really intend to get into this, by quality the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Savy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Damaged my car worse than the dents I was trying to pull
customer_reviews.text: Used on hail damage, pulled the dents out WAY TO FAR, now I'll need to get body work that will include a paint job rather than just paintless dent removal. I probably caused an extra $2000 dollars worth of damage to me car because of this tool. Should have just let the PDR guys do it from the beginning. HUGE disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: JP and cody

customer_reviews.title: This is a great and easy to use system. I am truly glad that I made this purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used truck that had two small dimples in the roof, luggage area. I read the easy to follow instructions, heated the glue sticks, affixed the correct dimple puller; then attached the puller and applied pressure....superb results. The dimple was gone!! I was afraid to mark the dimple with a marker, so I bought and used a grease pencil to ID the area to be pulled; fantastic results as the dimple is gone. My wife’s car has 3 dimples on her rooftop. I have no fear in fixing these blemishes today.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: DENT GONE CAR SOLD
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with what got for the money spent. The quality is just outstanding. It is made to do the job easy and fast plus it is money saver. This bad boy is design to fix many kind of small dents maybe some big ones to. There are many fittings for all sorts of dent sizes and shapes. It is easy to used with good instruction. The dent puller did the job clean, neat and paid for itself. What more do you want. Compare the cost of the dent puller to the cost of a body shop.
customer_reviews.author: Grover C Sims Jr

customer_reviews.title: If you’re patient, it can make things better
customer_reviews.text: The ding in my door was right above and into a crease in the door panel, so I wasn’t expecting to be able to pull it back perfectly. After a lot of fiddling with different size bits, and many pulls, it has certainly made the dent smaller. I might try again when I have some more time. Key tips: 1. Clean the area well 2. Be patient. Make sure the glue gun has time to get hot; wait for the glue to harden on the metal too (it says 3-5 minutes; I left it 5 very time). 3. Don’t expect a single pull to fix it! I spent several hours applying, waiting and pulling to get the dent to shrink.
customer_reviews.author: bluedonkey

customer_reviews.title: This is a good tool for removing all kinds of dents
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tool for removing all kinds of dents. The pulling bridge is heavy duty and durable. I used several of the many glue tabs to pull small hail dents on the sheet metal automobile hood and a rather large dent on the plastic rear bumper. I had to borrow a glue gun from a crafter (my wife) and get trained how to use it. The instructions could be expanded so there might be less experimentation. Overall, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: DennisF

customer_reviews.title: Hot glue doesn't pull hard enough.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for this. It didn't come with a glue gun, and the hot glue didn't have enough pulling power before it popped off.
customer_reviews.author: DLove

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do the trick for me
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a hail damaged truck. Tried it in 4 different places.... followed directions and all. But it didn't pull any dents out.... and the glue stuff was hard to get off.... honestly I couldn't get it all off. I am going to wait for a hot day to try to pull that off. I had really high hopes for this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it seemed like it was doing what it was intended to do
customer_reviews.text: Even though I had to return mine, it seemed like it was doing what it was intended to do. The problem was that my dent was located on a crease on the vehicle body so it was not enough to pull that edge. I am 100% sure that if it was on a flat surface it would do its job no problem. Customer service was incredebly awsome. Very caring and responded promptly. They even took the time to verify if it would do the work I wanted it to.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Palencia

customer_reviews.title: You are unable to use this item unless you have ...
customer_reviews.text: You are unable to use this item unless you have the glue gun, which they make you write a review in order to get
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing, but overall good bit of kit.
customer_reviews.text: Puller arrived with a missing lock nut for the one foot. After a quick look around my shop I found one that fit and off to the races.. Was surprised to find the glue sticks were not the standard 11mm size, but the smaller size so they were useless to me unless I purchased another glue gun. Overall product works as intended, the tab assortment is fantastic and the glue removes perfectly so no time loss on time consuming ding pulls.
customer_reviews.author: Matt D.

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built. Works well! Good value for the money. Instructions are pretty clear but could be better. Also, the print is pretty small and ion dark paper so it is hard to read. But close enough. Note--the included adhesive sticks use the mini-style glue gun which is not included.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty well. It does not come with a glue gun and the normal craft glue guns use larger glue sticks. Slightly frustrating to find out after the fact. The black glue stick did not stick to the car as well as I thought it would and required me to perform the fix 4 times before removing majority of the dent. This was used on door dings and the issue that creates is that door dings usually have one sharp point in the dent, these are harder to remove. Overall, it removed majority of the dent and I plan on trying it again to see if I can get it smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: It won't pull every dent
customer_reviews.text: I put a pea sized dent in a customer's refrigerator door. Bought this and spend about an hour trying to fix it. There was some improvement but that size dent leaves very little surface area for the glue to grab. Luckily the dent was down near the floor so you have to look for it. This is a nice tool and set of attachments but Don't expect miracles.
customer_reviews.author: phil morse

customer_reviews.title: Well built, but glue sucks
customer_reviews.text: The tool itself is robust and easy to use, but the glue is too skinny for any conventional glue gun. I had to attempt to push the glue with my second hand to get it out of the nozzle and it ended up backing up and spilling out. Don't offer glue with your product if it can't fit properly in any glue gun. Just don't offer it at all if you're trying to save money. If you do offer any, make sure it's thick enough to fit into the glue gun properly.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic piece with the hot glue on it would pull off without removing the dent even a little. I tried different techniques such as a little less glue, a little more glue, longer dry time, etc. Still, nothing worked. I'm really unhappy that I just now had the opportunity to try it and my return window has closed!
customer_reviews.author: kidney

customer_reviews.title: Have not used it yet, but I researched before ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet, but I researched before buying and was very impressed with the design of the tool. After receiving it, it is exceptionally well made and comes with everything you need (except a glue gun which they offer to for free for writing a review). Very well priced for the what you get. Can't wait to give it a try it..
customer_reviews.author: Karen N.

customer_reviews.title: Unable to pull out dents
customer_reviews.text: I tried many times to pull out the dents and none of them could be repaired. I followed the directions exactly and waited more than enough time for the adhesive to bond, but each time I tried to pull the dent out, the adhesive released without affecting the dents. The good part was there was no damage to the paint and the glue was easily removed.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Did what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.text: Took a 5" crease out of my truck fender. Had to work it out a little at a time. Not sure what the difference is between the two colors of glue. Used only the black so far. Tool worked flawlessly but look carefully...this one won't fix a big dent as the support pads are very close together. In other words, you would need a wider "stance" for a bigger dent.
customer_reviews.author: James Specht

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. Package includes a variety of options for just about any size dent. Instructions are provided although translation into English is a little rough they are adequate to use the product. The dent lifter saved me a large repair shop bill and the results are amazing. It is necessary to follow the time lines for best results.
customer_reviews.author: gary reed

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. The tabs are weak and break easily. Used on two separate occasions for 2+ hours and still have a small ding on my door. My wife wasn’t impressed even though the instructions say it’s “easy enough for a woman.”
customer_reviews.author: JasNLee

customer_reviews.title: Be patient and determined
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why there are negative reviews. The unit is simple and the materials do exactly what they were designed to do. It does require a bit of patience and repeated applications to get it right, but that's what I expect of any repair job. However, I fixed minor dents on my accord and lr4 and they are both back to dent free. It's kind of crazy how it fixed them actually. Be patient and determined and it will be worth it in the end. Like most things in life.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Reduced the dents. Be patient.
customer_reviews.text: This didn't totally take the dents out but definitely reduced it. Don't use too much hot glue. The more glue the greater the chance of it sticking to your car or the plastic piece breaking. Make sure you have plenty of time to do this as you will have to use the tool a few times for each dent. Be patient because it takes a few tries to get the hang of it. P.s. if you do get for glue stuck on your car, take a library card to it & scrape it off.
customer_reviews.author: Emily M Salas

customer_reviews.title: Dents are much less noticeable, worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: Delivery speed and tool quality were great; it's easy to use. I had no problems having the process remove the paint. Glue sticks fit into a 'mini' glue gun. My suggestions: Don't use alcohol to clean the paint beforehand, it reduces the sticking process. Let the glue get very hot before applying, it seems to adhere to the car better than slightly warm glue. Experiment with how long to let the glue dry before using the puller and adjust for depth and size of the dent (for more pull, dry longer). You will need to repeat the process several times to pull non-circular dents, going back to re-pull the deepest dent(s) remaining.
customer_reviews.author: 1st time user - no auto repair experience

customer_reviews.title: Note When Using An Older Glue Gun...
customer_reviews.text: The PDR tools arrived as expected. They seem solid and sturdy. I haven't used them yet because I was going to use the glue gun that has been in the garage for years. But the glue sticks in this package are much smaller in diameter than the regular old glue guns from the 1900's. The sticks have a diameter that is probably a little larger than an ink pen. So the old glue gun can't grasp the sticks when pulling the trigger. But the package from Carshome came with a free gift offer that will be using to get the correct glue gun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good may take a few tries to get the best result.
customer_reviews.text: Product worked very good for a dent in the side of the pickup from who knows where and also worked pretty good for a stainless steel refrigerator door. The refrigerator took a few tries to get a good outcome and still not perfect but 90% better than how it looked before I used this tool. My error caused the dent so live and learn but at least now I am not as irritated every time I open the refrigerator door.
customer_reviews.author: jac

customer_reviews.title: Great Dent Puller but attachments broke very easily
customer_reviews.text: This dent puller worked great for the most part. Some of the attachments broke so I wasn’t able to use those ones multiple times. The others that didn’t break worked great. The dents were mostly from other doors banging into mine so they were pretty small in size but I was able to pull them out and you cannot tell the dents were even there now.
customer_reviews.author: Megan N Brunscher

customer_reviews.title: Great dent Pull Tool
customer_reviews.text: I received the Gliston dent pull tool today and went right to work on the dent in my new 2019 Chevrolet. The dent was in a seam region of the truck. Having the multiple attachments helped ensure I could pull the dent without causing additional damage. Great first use experiance and would recomend this tool to even the novice of car repair users.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Solid looking tool at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this tool is definitely sturdy. Overall, I can't see any problem with this tool. It comes with a generous supply of different pull tabs that should suit most different types of dents -- more than I'll ever need (I hope!). Comes with instructions, but there are also plenty of YouTube videos to explain the use. Pretty happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus Minimus

customer_reviews.title: Solid dent remover tool
customer_reviews.text: Solid aluminum tool with plenty of adhesion adapters to pick from. The surface of the car must be completely clean so the glue can adhere to the painted metal. Ceramic coatings and freshly waxed cars don't stick as well. Work slowly with many attempts rather than trying to remove the dent in the first two tries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Remove car dents
customer_reviews.text: Received the Gilston tools and am looking forward to using them to pull a couple nagging dents in car's metal finish. I opted for the sturdier golden dent lifter. Wide assortment of glue tabs to fit most any dent. Buyers need to understand that this kit doesn't include a glue gun or spatulas so you will need to get these separately.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased at how well this works and how easy it is to use. I was pretty skeptical but thought what the heck I'll give it a try. It comes nicely packaged with all the parts in separate bags along with a nice brochure of how to use it and what the parts are. I immediately put it to work taking out 3 dents in my truck that I didn't think would pop out. It actually popped one out too far so be careful about that. I have several more to do, so I should be a pro in no time! Overall its a great product and in my opinion worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus S.

customer_reviews.title: Glue sticks are narrow diameter.
customer_reviews.text: This product saved me $150! It made a couple of door dings almost disappear. I am sure with some more experience on my part I will learn how to make dings completely disappear. I like having a large variety of shapes and sizes of pads to choose. The process is quite easy. I did not order the kit which has the glue gun because I have a glue gun but the glue sticks are the narrow diameter sticks so I had to borrow a glue gun. I will now be checking all of my family’s cars for dings to fix. It actually is fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: John Holle

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Glue tab stems stretched which made this product worthless. The actual puller tool was very good quality
customer_reviews.author: KareJean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised!! Removed two relatively deep dings/dents from the driver side door of my 2019 Chevy Traverse. Took my husband minutes to do right in our driveway. Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Marty and Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for small dents
customer_reviews.text: This dent puller is really easy to use. Careful when first unpacking it. Like previous reviewers a bolt was lose at the leg. Simple screw back together and it’s perfectly fine. One of the rubber pad was also not aligned with the metal base, so make sure you slip it back on before attempting to pull a dent with this thing or you make have a scratch to worry about after pulling the dent. May want to get a tap down tool as a companion to this just in case you over pull and get a peak. Other than that it took out some small dents on a S2000
customer_reviews.author: David N

customer_reviews.title: Surprised how well it worked.
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting professional results but this greatly exceed my expectations. Watched a few YouTube videos and read the instructions. Took my time and was pleased. 90% repaired six or so door dings with plenty left over to make many more repairs. . Passes the 4’ test easily now. Was quoted $445 to repair- gave this a go and was super impressed.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ward

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: It is important that one understands the nature of car steel. This dent puller works, but it takes patience. It will not just pop out in one try. I fixed the door ding on my Miata and it took about 6 pops with yellow glue stick. Now, you cannot see any imperfections. So, read the directions carefully and then allow time to do the job right.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Cain

customer_reviews.title: it really does pull out small dings and dents very easily. After you pop off the glue
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Of course, you have to take the time to clean the paint and to then select a "puller" that is appropriately sized, but if you do that, it really does pull out small dings and dents very easily. After you pop off the glue, use some alcohol for cleanup for the residue and you're good to go!
customer_reviews.author: dhoelzer

customer_reviews.title: MUCH STURDIER THAN I EXPECTED FOR THE PRICE !!!
customer_reviews.text: This small unit is perfect for smaller dents and dings. I have never been able to get my larger pullers to concentrate enough force in a very small arena. I have already smoothed two motorcycle gas tanks and a small dent in one of our cars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Everitt

customer_reviews.title: Money saver
customer_reviews.text: Very good tool. Will make me save thousands of dollars. But of course it's not magic and you need some practice and a lot of patience before to acheive a perfect job but after several trial and errors I became pretty good and the dents are almost invisible. If you have time and patience and you don't want to spend 2000$ I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Watch YouTube videos first; take it slow and easy.
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to use and self-explanatory. After some practice, I was able to pull out small dings from my Honda S2000. Be sure to watch YouTube videos of more experienced people using the product before you try using it. Take it slow and easy. The only criticism I have is the description of the kit seemed to suggest it came with a glue gun but it did not. However, this is probably because I did not review the description carefully enough. Happy pulling!
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Mata

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but it actually worked! I deducted a star for a couple of reasons... 1) they provide all these plastic tabs and some are the same size, only different patterns. However, they don't tell you which is for what task. Very similar with the glue rods.. i did learn the golden ones are the STRONGEST. Reason 2) they mechanical assembly was not put together well... sort of fell apart and i had to re-tighten the two lock nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Newman

customer_reviews.title: He has t yer used it but he did like that it had a lot of the stuff he ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this kit to my husband for Christmas. He has t yer used it but he did like that it had a lot of the stuff he needed to pull dents except the glue gun! I didn’t know it was something he needed but you would think it would come with it since it’s a kit. This particular product did come with a way to encourage customers to write a review and if you do it you can pick from 2 free gifts one being the glue gun, so i guess all in all a win win situation and a good strategic marketing tool to get reviews of products.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the casual user.
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than my old tool. It has saved me a lot of cash with just one use. I now have removed almost all of the dents in my old BMW. I do recommend watching some Youtube videos on how to do PDR before you use it. This is not a "professional" grade tool, but, for the price it serves my hobbyist level needs quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Jubal Harshaw

customer_reviews.title: find out what size glue tabs you need first
customer_reviews.text: got it all in a very nice organized box, very easy to keep every thing for the next time that i might need to re-use it it comes with a lot of glue tabs - that is very important, so you will not use the wrong ones. (its harder when i picked to wrong size). easy to use, and saved me money that i would have spent at a bodyshop
customer_reviews.author: EYDAN

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME DENT PULLER
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use dent puller. Just follow the directions and your ding will be gone. Really this is a no brainer product. Make sure you give the glue enough time to set before pulling. The tabs will stick better if the car is not out in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: G. Patten

customer_reviews.title: No glue gun included
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come with a glue gun. In their defense it doesn't claim to come with a glue gun but I don't have one lying around so now I can't use the product which is very annoying. They do offer you the ability to get a glue gun for free if you leave a review so here you have it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality PDR kit at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This PDR tool kit comes very complete and parts are high quality. It includes tons of glue tabs and the actual puller is very high quality. I have not used PDR tools in the past, so lots of YouTube searching to understand how to use this - I would suggest that a better set of instructions be included...but YouTube very helpful for that. Overall, very high quality, complete kit at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are JUNK!  Don't was your money.
customer_reviews.text: These are JUNK! I ordered one of these sets, the idea seemed good but the part you glue to the dent is cheap soft plastic. I tried 5 times to pull a quarter size dent out and the puller tore the knob off of each tab without much effort. It is a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: DakotaFox

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great product to lift out spots like hail spots on top of roof. adjustable tension though use the correct hot glue type. Quality product. Be patient with your repair, haste makes waste and a poor finish.
customer_reviews.author: Badis

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Finally had a chance to use this on a few dents in my cars. Works really well. Saved me hundreds of dollars. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David Keilholz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dent remover
customer_reviews.text: Great product/tools. Helps remove dents from hail, and door dings. Used on wjole familys cars. Well worth the money. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to have a glue gun on hand
customer_reviews.text: This product worked very well. I knew I was going to have a problem with the main dent I was trying to repair-it had a crease in it. The repair is much much better than it was but there is still a light crease left in it. For simple dimples it worked flawlessly. Be sure to purchase a hot glue gun to go with this product
customer_reviews.author: Shotsy

customer_reviews.title: Easy-to-Follow Instructions & Long-Term Potential
customer_reviews.text: It was a great tool to remove the dents in our cars. The detailed instructions were very helpful with the accompanying pictures. Very satisfied with the product and hope to use it may more times in the future.
customer_reviews.author: geniusing

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts - Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I just received the product and only tried for about 10 minutes to get the dents - no luck so far. Partly, when I received it, it was missing the two nuts that attach to the pins near the bottom metal/rubber pads. I nearly lost the pin before realizing the nuts were missing. Anyone else have the same issue?
customer_reviews.author: Allen Family

customer_reviews.title: Good for removing small dents!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use way to remove small dents. Suggest buying a larger packet that includes a dent hammer, pins, though. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: awolff

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it's supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: What a great little product. I had some small dents in my Miata and my wife's Audi. I watched a few videos on how to use it, and went to work. It works like a charm. The included directions are a little vague, but not bad. I also bought the tap down tool and rubber hammer. You'll need this in case it pulls out a little too far. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: T E T

customer_reviews.title: it works and its easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to remove a dent from the refrigerator door. My worry was I would do more damage than good. Turns out the process was very straight forward and lifted the dent out to the point it can only be detected by touch. Alcohol does clean the glue but it takes a little effort. The kids' cars are next....
customer_reviews.author: Susanna Pike

customer_reviews.title: The directions say "Everyone can operate it, Even if a woman" :)
customer_reviews.text: Quality looks very good! This is perfect for a DIY job. If you are successful removing a few dents, it is worth the price alone! Directions got mixed up a bit on translation - that is my only suggestion for improvement. There are countless youtube videos showing how to use these tools.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the product.
customer_reviews.text: This dent puller was shipped to my house in a very timely manner. When I took it out of the package I was impressed with the quality of the device. I noticed that the puller pads were in good shape and there were a lot of them; more than expected. I also received ten adhesive sticks with the puller. In addition there was a plastic bag that was of decent quality that I have used to store all components of my kit. No off to pull out the hail/pinecone damage on my car.
customer_reviews.author: reed

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: So first using this product I was a little skeptical and scared it would make more damage, but after using it, it pulled out all 3 of the door dings in my car. It absolutely amazed me with how well and the big of a difference it made! I highly recommend using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Snyder

customer_reviews.title: It will strip off your cars clear coat. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a product that won’t work and also strip the clear coat off your cars paint than get this! The glue isn’t strong enough to hold while you are trying to pull out the dent with the provided tool, but it’s strong enough to take off the clear coat and make your dent look even worse. These product is a piece of sh*t
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No glue gun included
customer_reviews.text: Just want to give everyone heads up, this package does not include glue gun (or pay attention to detail unlike me). other than that everything else seem to be here for me to attempt to remove the dent in my hood. I will write again after I get glue gun and try removing dent myself
customer_reviews.author: Donald Holder

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality (appears to be billet aluminum) with a wide array of puller tab sizes/shapes. Took 3 tries to pull a dent along a creased edge (more difficult than on a flat surface), but it did the job!Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Solid Dent Puller
customer_reviews.text: The dent puller and attachments seem to be good quality, but it didn't arrive with any glue sticks. I will update my review if I receive them. Edit: After emailing them I received the glue sticks and gun within a week. I'm looking forward to trying this puller on my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Morrow

customer_reviews.title: No more dents!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. It sometimes takes several attempts to get the dent all the way out, but it did the job very well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Grimaud

customer_reviews.title: Workerd for me
customer_reviews.text: Product performed to expectations. Helped me remove several small dents. Glue gun is not provided with this package and buyer should note that a standard glue gun may not work with the provided glue sticks as they are of a smaller diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Allan R

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kit: Exactly What I Need
customer_reviews.text: I selected this PDR kit because it included just the things I wanted, and for a great price. Many of the kits being sold have a lot of extra things that I don't know that I need. This kit has the puller, more mushrooms than a lot of the other kits, and it included enough of both types of glue, so that I can practice and figure out what color I really need.
customer_reviews.author: Brian N.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent PDR product
customer_reviews.text: Product is user friendly. All products arrived all in one piece. All items were easily identified. Item was very easy to use & did the job satisfactory to its highest standard. I highly recommend this product to its fullest.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works good on all metal surfaces. Removed dent from stainless refrigerator, looks like new
customer_reviews.author: Active customer

customer_reviews.title: On the first pull the glue came off and the ...
customer_reviews.text: On the first pull the glue came off and the dent was still there. I will try again on a warmer day to see if that makes a difference and then change my rating if it improves, but for now... 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Harless

customer_reviews.title: It would help in the kit description if there was a disclaimer that stated additional products need to be purchased like denatured alcohol
customer_reviews.text: What the kit contains is only part of what you need to do the job. It would help in the kit description if there was a disclaimer that stated additional products need to be purchased like denatured alcohol, a spray bottle, a hot glue gun, and plastic spatula in order for this product to work. A clearer translation into English for the direction sheet would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Product did not work for my car, but it might for others.
customer_reviews.text: My car has an older paint job which most likely contributed to the ineffectiveness of this product on the hail dents. It might work better on newer cars with stronger factory paint coats.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Bad

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help my dents
customer_reviews.text: It's not that good at sticking. Didn't help the dents I tried
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: Spent over an hour trying to get one hail dent out (and it was pretty minor) - didn't do a thing. Returned. Wouldn't recommend in the slightest.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Get the hammer set too
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product and works but two things: 1. it was missing a nylon nut on the hinge bolt so i have to go find one. 2. I recommend getting the hammer kit as well since this usually is required to finish getting the rest of the dent out
customer_reviews.author: Mallory R.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product:
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well designed tool that works as described, I was very satisfied with my results, use as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Purchase the knock down tool and the glue gun for best results
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality tool I would recommend purchasing to a friend or family member. Timing is critical with the glue I am sure the professionals are aware of this. I had success with a motorcycle oil tank which I think is a thicker metal than the tool was designed for but it has worked well for this purpose. I suggest purchasing the knock down tool and the glue gun for automotive use.
customer_reviews.author: William Ted Foster

customer_reviews.title: Would have like some instructions with the product
customer_reviews.text: I watched several Youtube videos before attempting to use the product. Still unsure wether should use the clear or back glue, or the size of the tip based on the size of the dent. Trying to fix a couple of dents on stainless steel appliance. Glue did not hold but I am guessing it could be the temperature of the glue not hot enough. I did clean the surface with alcohol prior to gluing. Will continue to try.
customer_reviews.author: FCDC

customer_reviews.title: Takes time but works
customer_reviews.text: Takes time and practice. I still have some more work to do on the edge of my trunk lid but it is a tough cookie. That being said the dent has already been improved and is less noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! After a little practice, it was easy to fix hail damage to my car.
customer_reviews.author: Dhiddy

customer_reviews.title: Tools work
customer_reviews.text: Takes time and patience but product has all the tools to get those dents out of most any size
customer_reviews.author: Steve R.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. You get more than what u paid for. That's for sure.
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with the whole kit. I recommend it to anyone. Had some dents on the roof and pulled them out with the first try. I should of bought this before I purchased a slide hammer. The tabs are good. They're stronger than the cheap plastic tabs.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Easiest way to remove dents without having to paint.
customer_reviews.text: The kit has everything you need except the reflector board a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Raimond C

customer_reviews.title: Proper seating of the tab.
customer_reviews.text: I find this works better than the brifge as it gives you the chance make short, sudden pulls that the screw-down version cannot.
customer_reviews.author: John Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Made well but didn't work good, wouldn't pull out my dent.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN M THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: good kit, took out my dents
customer_reviews.text: Took a 2 inch dent out of my brother's hood. didn't come out perfect but that's probably because i'm a beginner. it's 99% perfect now. :)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Angelo Kanterakis

customer_reviews.title: not working too well for me
customer_reviews.text: The black rubber cover on the base arrived damaged, it has a hold in punctured by one of the corners. Tested the puller on a small dent several times but doesn't seem to do anything. I might work better for large dents (inch or larger?).
customer_reviews.author: T. Cho

product_meta.title: GLISTON Dent Puller Tools, 31pcs Paintless Dent Repair Tools Kit Paintless Dent Removal Golden Dent Lifter + paintless Glue Sticks + Glue Tabs Auto Body Dent Removal Tools Car Dent Removal Tool Kit
product_meta.description:
31 PCS Auto Body Dent Puller Tools 

There is no high paint material & labor costs associated with a conventional repair, so it will save 90% at least by paintless dent removal tools making dent removal
Suit for hail dent , hit dent and other reason cause dent 

Unique Key Features: 

-Golden Dent Lifter: Made from high quality and light weight aluminum then powder coated, Padded feet add support for maximum pulling power while not denting surrounding areas. It can remove the dent by controlled the hand.(Note: suit for within 3cm small dent) 

- Pro Glue Tabs : come from 24 different size high durability plastic and Spiral designed glue tabs ,it can suit for different size car dent and help you remover the dent more easily. 

- Pro Glue Sticks : made of pro environmental material ,which is anti-aging, wide practical, fast bonding, fresh smell, good thermal stability . 

- Professional guidance : come with using product introduction you can use this dent puller kits more easily. 

- We OFFER :FULL 100% MANUFACTURER MONEY BACK

If you find any issues in this products, or any of our products, please contact our Amazon Prime Service Customer Support line and we'll offer you a free replacement or a full refund

PROTECT OIL PAINT - Protect Oil Paint,Our Dent Remover Kit Lift have a Soft Silicone Bottom,it can Protect Oil Paint

STRONG VISCOSITY GLUE STICKS - Pro Paintless Dent Repair Kit with yellow Glue Sticks is a Better Strong Viscosity,Suitable for Relatively Harder Parts on Cars,Black Color Glue Sticks is Suit for Relatively Soft on Car, after Our Several Tests,These Glue Sticks's Best Melt Time is 5-8 Minutes for 100w Glue Gun, Adhesive Cooling Time about 2 Minutes is the best Working Time for Car Dent Repair
EASY OPERATION - Dent Repair Tools Works Great on Smaller Door Dings & Hail damage ,you can Repair Dent from Car Body Anytime or Anywhere by Yourself
